Hi
I downloaded this and all the files were MKV files...how do i watch them? :/

tatasGR - Graphics? It's not a video game, it doesn't have a graphics engine built into it, anyway, I hope they are good, the comments don't look promising but it's worth a look.

I was really hoping for something a little closer to the game than a DBZ rip off and oiled paint, I like the cartoons I saw in some Halo 3 cutscenes, they were beauty at it's finest.
MKV files can be played best with Media Player Classic (using the K-Lite Codec Pack), or you can use VLC Media Player. I recommend MPC.
